articles.title: Greetings to Pakistani President
articles.content:
Greetings to Pakistani President
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Mamnoon Hussain, president of Pakistan, on Thursday on the Day of Pakistan.
					 The message wished the Pakistani president bigger success in his work for the country's prosperity and social stability, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in conformity with the common interests and desire of the two peoples.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Slams Japan's Spy Satellite Launch
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Slams Japan's Spy Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Wednesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA with regard to the fact that Japan launched a spy satellite aiming at intensifying watch on the DPRK:
					 Japan launched H-2A rocket carrying a spy satellite at the Tanegashima Space Centre in Kagoshima Prefecture of Japan on March 17.
					
					 The Japanese authorities announced that the satellite is aiming at gathering intelligence about the ballistic missile launches of the DPRK, revealing itself that it is a spy satellite.
					
					 The satellite launch, conducted by Japan at a time when the departed soul of militarism is haunting, is another product of its premeditated policy of militarization and a clear revelation of its ambition for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 An ally of the U.S. can develop any missile or launch any spying satellite without any problem, but a country hostile to the U.S. is not allowed to exercise the right to launch legitimate and peaceful satellite which is recognized by international law. Nothing can justify this robber-like logic.
					
					 That's why we proposed clarifying the legal ground of the "resolutions on sanctions" of the UN Security Council and arranging a forum of international legal experts for it.
					
					 However, the UN Secretariat still keeps mum about it.
					
					 We will continue exercising the legitimate right to development of space for peaceful purposes, no matter what others may say, and take thorough measures to cope with Japan's militarization and its moves to realize the ambition for reinvasion.

articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Sends Letter to UN Secretary General
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative at UN Sends Letter to UN Secretary General
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the DPRK at the United Nations sent a letter to the UN secretary general on Wednesday as regards the fact that the situation on the Korean peninsula has reached the brink of war due to the largest-ever joint military drills being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean regime.
					 Detailing the scale and purpose of the dangerous war rehearsal being staged by the U.S. in league with the south Korean warlike forces, the letter referred to the fact that the DPRK on March 6 urged the UN Security Council to hold an emergency meeting to discuss the issue of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills as an agenda item but has not yet received a response.
					
					 The letter went on:
					
					 The UNSC, while taking issue with the normal military exercises being held by our military in our own land, is persistently turning away from our call for an emergency meeting regarding the said aggressive joint military exercises. This is an extreme end of unfairness and double standards and a shabby prejudice.
					
					 The measures being undertaken to strengthen the national military power in our land, waters and air space are the regular self-defensive ones to safeguard the sovereignty of our country from the continuous nuclear threats and blackmails coming from the United States.
					
					 We and the neighboring countries as well are deeply concerned about the aggressive nature and danger of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					
					 It is the unanimous conclusion of the fair international society that the on-going largest-ever nuclear war exercises is the root cause of pressing the DPRK to the toughest counteraction.  
					
					 I request you to bring to the attention of the UN Security Council in line with Article 99 of the UN Charter regarding the on-going highly dangerous U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises which are an obvious threat to international peace and security.  
					
					 I believe that this is in conformity with not only the requirement of the UN Charter but also the mission of the UN Secretariat which has impartiality and independence as its lifeline.
					
					 I look forward to you, who took the oath to be committed to the UN Charter, to positively consider and respond to our sincere appeals.

articles.title: Researcher of Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry on Deserved Treatment Sustained by S. Korea
articles.content:
Researcher of Disarmament and Peace Institute of DPRK Foreign Ministry on Deserved Treatment Sustained by S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The full text of "Deserved Treatment" written by Ri Song Il, a researcher of the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, Thursday reads as follows:
					 Recently lamentation deploring their own plight is being heard from the puppet south Korean group occasioned by U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson's visit to Japan, south Korea and China, drawing the attention of media across the world.
					
					 Choongang Ilbo of south Korea in an article expressed disappointment as the state secretary praised Japan as the "most important ally" while calling south Korea just an "important partner" during his recent tour. The paper commented it as the Trump administration's acknowledgment of the level of the U.S.-south Korea alliance lower than the U.S-Japan alliance.
					
					 In Japan the secretary expressed his stand at a press conference after full exchange of views with the Japanese foreign minister, while in south Korea he hastily held a press conference clarifying the U.S. stand before having a talk with the puppet foreign minister. This meant total negligence of south Korea's view, the paper deplored, adding that the secretary did not include dinner in schedule only in south Korea even though he had dinner schedules with diplomatic bosses in China and Japan.
					
					 The south Korean Maeil Economy, reporting about the non-reference of THAAD by the U.S. state secretary during his meeting with the Chinese foreign minister, said expectation that the U.S. would exercise its influence on China, which is putting pressure on south Korea over THAAD deployment, crumbled.
					
					 Media of various countries, too, said south Korea is greatly disappointed by the U.S. state secretary's recent visit.
					
					 The maltreatment and contempt sustained by the south Korean regime this time are something quite deserved.
					
					 The reason that the south Korean authorities have become like an empty Kimchi pot is attributable to their acting as a puppet at the beck and call of the U.S. and according to divination signs given by shaman Choe Sun Sil without their own clear standpoint and "policy".
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye resorted to the "policy for putting pressure on the north" while pursuing the policy of "unification of social systems" with hope pinned on the "story of the north's collapse". And she pressed for the deployment of THAAD, a dangerous system which will bring instability and disaster to the Korean peninsula and the region, despite unanimous rejection and denunciation at home and abroad. This is well known to the world.
					
					 Nothing can change the relations between the master and stooge no matter how desperately the south Korean regime may go hell-bent on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen while acting as a shock brigade in executing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. Masters are masters and stooges are stooges.
					
					 The remarks of the U.S. state secretary during his recent tour made the world people clearly see the relations between the master and stooge and how the U.S., whom the south Korean puppet regime look up to as God, treat south Korea.
					
					 When the stooge is needed, it is shielded and used but when it is considered to be useless, it is disregarded. This is American pragmatism.
					
					 The south Korean authorities can never get rid of the deplorable fate of stooge as long as they escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen, taking advantage of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, not properly seeing who is the enemy of reunification and principal enemy of the nation.
					
					 Whoever deals with the south Korean puppet authorities, who were punished by their own people and forsaken even by their master for acting as a puppet of others and for going reckless, being unaware of where they stand, will only face shame and disgrace.

articles.title: Congolese Government Delegation Here
articles.content:
Congolese Government Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A Congolese government delegation led by Jacqueline Lydia Mikolo, minister of Health and Population, arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: Film Show Given at DPRK Embassy in Havana
articles.content:
Film Show Given at DPRK Embassy in Havana
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Havana arranged a film show on March 15 to mark the 31st anniversary of Fidel Castro Ruz's visit to the DPRK.
					 Present at the show were officials concerned of Cuba and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "The Party and Government Delegation of the Republic of Cuba Led by Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz Visits the DPRK".
					
					 Cuban personages said that the DPRK would demonstrate its might as a socialist fortress always under the Songun revolutionary leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the noble cause of the preceding leaders, adding that the meeting between President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz was a historic occasion in further developing the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Cuba and the DPRK have relations of comrades-in-arms who are standing on the same front for the common purpose.
					
					 The Cuban people will make active efforts to constantly develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations with the genuine and fraternal Korean people.

articles.title: Pakistani Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Pakistani Embassy Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday to mark the Day of Pakistan.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, and officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Syed Sajjad Haider, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Pakistani embassy, and his embassy members were on hand.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A national seminar was held at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to deeply grasp the validity and vitality of ideas and theories set forth by leader Kim Jong Il in his work "On the Juche Idea" and thoroughly embody them in the struggle for the victorious advance of socialism.
					 Present there were officials of party, administration, working people's organizations, science, education, literature and arts, media, party cadre training institutions and revolutionary sites in Pyongyang.
					
					 It heard papers explaining and proving scientific accuracy, validity and vitality of the work and the tasks and ways arising in hastening the final victory of building a powerful socialist country under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Jong Il's work is an immortal program as it indicated the way for accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					 The Juche idea is the great philosophical idea that put the philosophical world outlook of mankind on the highest level, and a political philosophy that shows the principled base of politics guiding the social and revolutionary development along the straightest road, they stressed.
					
					 It is a firm guarantee for winning the victory in the revolution and construction to hold fast to the guiding principle of the Juche idea, they said, adding: 
					
					 It is the supreme noble moral obligation of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who share the intention and affection with Kim Jong Il and the most sacred duty as his soldiers and disciples to realize his idea of building a powerful socialist country at an early date under the banner of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Welding and Metal Materials
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Welding and Metal Materials
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of welding and metal materials took place at the Welding Institute of the State Academy of Sciences on March 22-23 under the sponsorship of the C.C., General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Attending it, held to mark the 40th anniversary of the Welding Institute, were scientists, technicians, teachers, graduate students, students and field officials of different units including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the State Academy of Sciences and the Chollima Steel Complex.
					
					 More than 130 papers were submitted to the presentation, divided into welding and metal materials panels.
					
					 At the presentation there were lectures on the production of rail steel and trend of its development, the trend of developing welding equipment and present situation, and the technology of manufacturing equipment and machine parts to be used in metal and machine industries.

articles.title: "Wonsan Air Festival-2017" to Be Held
articles.content:
"Wonsan Air Festival-2017" to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The international "Wonsan Air Festival-2017" will be held in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province amid the great expectation and interests of air-sport experts and fans of different countries. 
					 The festival opened last year left deep impressions as it proudly showed the aspects of developed air-sport technique of the DPRK and deepened the international friendship.
					
					 The "Wonsan Air Festival-2017" is scheduled to take place from September 23 to 25.
					
					 During the festival aeronautics of military and civil planes, parachute-drop skills, remote controlled flight of model planes, sightseeing flight, etc. will take place.
					
					 There will be colorful cultural events, seminar on boosting tourism in the Wonsan-Mt Kumgang International Tourist Destinations and tour of Mt Kumgang and Masik Pass area.
					
					 The festival will contribute to boosting friendship, unity, exchange and cooperation among the peoples of different countries desirous of peaceful and prosperous world.

articles.title: World TB Day Observed
articles.content:
World TB Day Observed
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to mark World Tuberculosis Day.
					 It was attended by officials in the field of public health and those concerned, acting representatives of WHO and UNICEF here and staff members of embassies of different countries and missions of international bodies here.
					
					 Speakers at the event called on all the people to deeply understand the importance of the drive to combat tuberculosis, take active part in the work and conduct the hygienic information service on tuberculosis. 
					
					 Only when all countries and international community strengthen cooperation with each other, can they thoroughly prevent tuberculosis worldwide, they noted.
					
					 Then, the participants looked round photos on display and enjoyed a performance given by a hygienic information team of students.
					
					 On the same day, intensive hygienic information services were given in Pyongyang and provinces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merits
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merits
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Pak Chang Song, a war veteran living in Somun-dong, Central District of Pyongyang, on the 90th birthday and Ryu Yong Bo, a researcher at Kim Chaek University of Technology, on the 70th birthday.
					 Born into a poor family in Myongchon County of North Hamgyong Province, Pak was subject to the sorrow of being a member of the stateless nation. He could lead a genuine happy life as a human being only in the country liberated by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 After graduating from the then Security Officers Training Centre, he devotedly safeguarded the party and the leader during the past Fatherland Liberation War. Later he had faithfully served in the army.
					
					 He was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and a watch bearing the august name of the President and had honor of attending various conferences including the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 4th National Conference of War Veterans.
					
					 Born into a peasant's family, People's Scientist, Prof. and Dr. Ryu has worked as a researcher and section chief for more than 40 years since his graduation from Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 He has devoted his wisdom and zeal to the training of scientific and technical personnel and the scientific researches of exploring the CNC technology and developing it to the highest level and wrote many books, textbooks, reference books and treatises worth national treasure.
					
					 He attended national conferences of scientists and technicians and was honored to receive high state commendations.

articles.title: Upgrading of Meteorological Equipment Hurried in DPRK
articles.content:
Upgrading of Meteorological Equipment Hurried in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- March 23 is the World Meteorological Day.
					 On this occasion, the World Meteorological Organization adopted "Understanding Clouds" as the theme for this year to underscore the need to know well about the effects of clouds which play a pivotal role in weather forecast and warnings.
					
					 This day, the hydro-meteorological sector of the DPRK carried out such diverse activities as bringing people to clearly understand how clouds affect the climate and how a changing climate will affect clouds.
					
					 In recent years, nationwide efforts have been directed to modernizing the weather forecast and observation equipment.
					
					 A regular weather forecast system was established and an analyzing method of short period forecast introduced into extended forecast to further raise the forecast nicety.
					
					 And a unified control system for hydro- and maritime-meteorological information was set up throughout the country to put observation and estimation of natural environment on a regular basis.
					
					 Scores of forecast aid programs were developed with the help of Kim Il Sung University, the State Academy of Sciences and other research institutes.
					
					 Meanwhile, more than 70 automatic meteorological observatories have been built in different parts of the country and Pyongyang Hydro-meteorological College was elevated to Pyongyang Hydro-meteorological University.

articles.title: Results of Construction of Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Results of Construction of Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The construction of Ryomyong Street in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, reached over 93 percent.
					 Tiling outer walls of apartment houses and service facilities was completed as of March 12. And other projects like pavement and electric light decoration have been pushed forward at the final stage.
					
					 The construction of 70-storied apartment house also nears its completion thanks to the devoted efforts of soldier-builders.
					
					 Builders from such units as the Ministry of Railways, the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps and the General Bureau of Public Catering Service strive to finish the interior and exterior of apartment houses and public buildings ahead of schedule.
					
					 Those units in charge of greening the street are taking good care of trees planted in greenbelts.

articles.title: Hakdang-gol Revolutionary Site Visited by Many People
articles.content:
Hakdang-gol Revolutionary Site Visited by Many People
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are flowing to the Hakdang-gol Revolutionary Site on the centenary of the Korean National Association (KNA) formed by Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter.
					 The KNA, the biggest anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organization in Korea, was formed in Hakdang-gol of Pyongyang. The site conveys the exploits Kim Hyong Jik performed by ushering in a fresh stage in the development of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea under the banner of achieving the independence by the efforts of Koreans and national unity.
					
					 The site has been visited by at least 1,874,400 people for the past four decades.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a new stamp (one sheet) on the occasion of the centenary of the Korean National Association (March 23, 1917).
					 Seen in the sheet are a stamp carrying the first stanza of song "Green Pine on Nam Hill" and its score in the background of letters "Jiwon (Aim High)" and a pine tree and the second and third stanzas of the song.
					
					 The song was authored by Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, in Juche 7 (1918) after his release from Pyongyang gaol and is an immortal work associated with the origin of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The song represents the idea of national independence that the destiny of the country and nation should be carved out by the Korean nation itself, not depending on any outsiders, and the indomitable revolutionary spirit and the spirit of continuous revolution to build a fair and honest society in Korea by fighting through generations.
					
					 Pine tree is the national tree of the DPRK symbolic of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Korean National Association
articles.content:
Korean National Association
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- It has been a hundred years since the Korean National Association (KNA) was formed by Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					 On this occasion, the Korean people are recalling with deep emotion the immortal life and exploits of Kim Hyong Jik who dedicated his all to the cause of national liberation in the spirit of national independence which urges every Korean to learn knowledge and technical skill for Korea.
					
					 The KNA, formed at Hakdang-gol in Pyongyang on March 23, Juche 6 (1917), was the largest one among anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organizations formed by Korean patriots at home and abroad before or after the March First Popular Uprising.
					
					 Its aim was to achieve the independence of the country and build a genuine civilized state with the concerted efforts of the entire Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik's lifelong will that the independence and prosperity of the country should be achieved by the Korean nation itself has been creditably carried forward by the peerlessly great men.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung implanted in the minds of all members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army the faith of self-reliance and self-development that to make the most of one's might plays a decisive role in giving strong impetus to the revolution.
					
					 The tradition of self-reliance created in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle was fully displayed in building a new Korea after the country's liberation. And with this spirit, the DPRK people created the Chollima speed and brought about the heyday in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In the period of the Arduous March, the forced march, a springboard for building a socialist power was provided and the DPRK ranked itself among the satellite manufacturers and launchers and nuclear weapons states thanks to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance stirred up by leader Kim Jong Il, despite of the moves of the U.S. imperialists and its followers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Now, the DPRK people are dynamically advancing toward the final victory in building the socialist power, firmly united around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un with the firm faith that it is the only way out for them to give fullest play to the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Throwing overboard S. Korean Reactionary Conservative Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Throwing overboard S. Korean Reactionary Conservative Forces
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The ultra-rightist conservative forces of south Korea are fated to be buried in the cemetery of history after the impeachment of Park Geun Hye. Yet, they are making last-ditch efforts to save their lives, swimming against the trend of the times and public mindset.
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article in this regard:
					
					It is absolutely intolerable that the traitors for all ages are still challenging the public mindset, refusing to admit their defeat.
					
					The south Korean people's resistance against Park culminated in a victory but the struggle for justice and social progress has just begun.
					
					The new politics and new life desired by them so much never come by themselves. Only when the conservative group is buried to the last man, can a genuine spring of freedom come to south Korea.
					
					It is the evil habit of the puppet conservative group to leave no stone unturned in a bid to gratify their greed for power, making a fool of the people.
					
					Having been pushed to the fringes of the times and history, cursed and rebuffed by the public mindset, the right-wing conservative forces are going so reckless as to escape their miserable fate and regain their past position.
					
					But, nothing can quell the strong aspiration and enthusiasm of the south Korean people from all walks of life for doing away with all injustices and building a new society.
					
					Unity is the key to victory and the popular masses can do anything if go united close.
					
					The sooner the root of evil is cut off, the less the trouble will be.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms S. Korean Conservatives Modern-day Political Chameleons
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms S. Korean Conservatives Modern-day Political Chameleons
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The coteries of south Korean puppet conservative parties are busy changing their true colors in the wake of the impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 In Myong Jin, chairman of the emergency measure committee, and others of the "Liberal Korea Party" seek to gain public support, asserting they would honestly accept the impeachment decision as they feel deeply sorry in the sense of responsibility.
					
					 They make much fuss, registering Hong Jun Phyo, governor of South Kyongsang Province, as "presidential" candidate and lifting the suspension of his party membership, although they had kicked him out for a partisan purpose.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ryu Sung Min and others of the "Parun Party" are misleading the public opinion by creating impression that they played a "leading role" in impeaching Park.
					
					 Such clumsy farces staged by swarms of modern-day political chameleons of south Korea in disguise are nothing but cynical ploys to cover up the crimes they committed in league with Park by pursuing sycophancy toward outsiders and to seize power through the forthcoming snap "presidential election."
					
					 No matter what charade the coteries of the conservative parties may stage ahead of the "presidential" election, they can never hide their true colors as traitors.
					
					 Those of the "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party" are all the worst criminals who have zealously supported the misrule of Park, played havoc with "state affairs" and plunged the people's livelihood into dire destitution over the past four years.
					
					 As far as In Myong Jin is concerned, he is just a die-hard conservative element who had blustered until January 19 that he would defend Park to the last in the face of any charges and criticism, remaining desperately averse to punishing her.
					
					 "Presidential" candidate Hong Jun Phyo is a kingpin of grafts for whom the prosecution had demanded two years in jail and a fine of a hundred million won last year for his involvement in a high-profile graft scandal that stunned the public. He challenged the mindset of the participants in the candlelight actions in south Korea by terming the court's decision on impeachment of Park "ill-minded trial backed by wrongly-guided public opinion."
					
					 Ryu Sung Min, "presidential candidate" from the "Parun Party," is also a bat-like guy being censured as a "Judas-like politician" within the political camp for being double-faced.
					
					 He took the lead in flattering Park when he was the floor leader of the "Saenuri party", asserting he felt sorry for failing to sincerely help Park who devotedly administered the state affairs. But he suddenly made a U-turn and left the party to seek his own interests, revealing his colors as a political chameleon.
					
					 Not content with such farces, the coteries of the "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party" are getting desperate in rallying conservative forces, trading such insults as "Judas" under the signboard of "transparent conservatism."
					
					  This is, indeed, an unpardonable mockery and insult to the candlelight actions staged by the public in south Korea to wipe out all evils and build a genuine and fresh society for the popular masses.
					
					 Growing stronger among the south Korean public at present are their disillusion and repugnance toward the coteries of the conservative parties and their conviction that they have nothing to expect from the conservative group.
					
					 The "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party" should be dissolved immediately, as demanded by the public, and removed from the south Korean political camp along with the doom of the old witch of Chongwadae.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Vow to Struggle for New Society
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Vow to Struggle for New Society
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Representatives of south Korean organizations comprising people of different social standings held a "meeting for democratic and peaceful regime and great change"  in Seoul on Mar. 21, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The meeting reviewed the successful activities of the people's emergency action for resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime and discussed the issues for the organizations and people of south Korea to cope with the "presidential election" in May and to set the direction of actions for building a new society after the election.
					
					 The meeting decided to form a new people's movement organization "national council of electors for democratic and peaceful regime and great change" and launch dynamic activities for a new society.
					
					 The participants vowed to direct all the efforts to building a new society in the spirit of the candlelight revolution. 
					
					 A resolution was made public at the meeting.
					
					 The participants expressed the will to declare the inauguration of the "national council of electors" at Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on April 1 and launch the massive actions for abolishing the evils and establishing a democratic and peaceful regime and accomplishing the candlelight revolution.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Urges Regime to Scrap Diplomatic and Security Policies
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Urges Regime to Scrap Diplomatic and Security Policies
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A south Korean online paper in an editorial on Mar. 20 demanded the authorities scrap their diplomatic and security policies of imploring for hostility toward the DPRK.
					 The recent trips to south Korea and Japan by the U.S. secretary of state were aimed to abandon the failed "strategic patience" policy of the Obama administration and draw up a new "north Korea policy" of the present U.S. administration, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The problem which the south Korean people should guard against ahead of the snap "president election" is a serious security policy of the forces still in power which are to blame for abusing "state administration".
					
					 The said policies of soliciting THAAD deployment and hostility to the north while talking about alliance with the U.S. should be scrapped.
					
					 No reasonable diplomatic and security policies can be expected from the forces that seek private interests, not genuine interests of the people, the editorial held.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Denounced by Syria
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Denounced by Syria
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Syrian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates released a statement on March 16 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills against the DPRK.
					 The statement expressed deep concern about the tension escalating on the Korean peninsula and the U.S. and its vassal forces' vicious moves to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Syrian Arab Republic firmly denounces all forms of joint military drills and smear campaign against the DPRK. Syria will stand firm on the side of the leadership and people of the DPRK waging a dynamic drive.
					
					 A war crisis should be eliminated on the Korean peninsula and peace and security be safeguarded in the region and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in India
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in India
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in New Delhi on March 17.
					 Atle Ranjan, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from March 17 to April 15 and decided to organize various political and cultural events in praise of the exploits Kim Il Sung performed for Korea's liberation, socialist construction, the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Portavoz de cancilleria coreana denuncia lanzamiento de satelite de espia de Japon
articles.content:
Portavoz de cancilleria coreana denuncia lanzamiento de satelite de espia de Japon
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que Japon lanzo un satelite de espia con el objeto de intensificar la vigilancia contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz de la cancilleria coreana respondio el dia 22 como lo siguiente:
					El dia 17, Japon lanzo un satelite a bordo de un cohete tipo H-2A en el Centro Cosmico Tanegashima del Departamento de Kagoshima.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas declararon que la luna artificial servira de recoger las informaciones sobre el lanzamiento de cohete balistico de la RPDC, revelando voluntariamente que eso es el satelite de espia.
					
					Este lanzamiento perpetrado abiertamente cuando existe la fantasma del militarismo, deviene otro producto de la planificada politica militarista del pais isleno y la muestra clara de su ambicion de reagresion a Corea.
					
					Nunca se puede justificar con nada la teoria gangsteril, segun la cual el pais aliado de EE.UU. puede desarrollar el misil y lanzar el satelite de espia a su antojo y el pais hostilizado por EE.UU. debe ser violado hasta el legitimo derecho a lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos, reconocido por la ley internacional.
					
					Por esta razon, la RPDC propuso explicar la base juridica de la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y organizar el forum internacional de los jurisconsultos.
					
					Pero, el Secretariado de la ONU esta todavia con boca cerrada.
					
					La RPDC ejercera dignamente el derecho al desarrollo cosmico con fines pacificos sin hacer caso de las difamaciones de otros y tomara las estrictas medidas frente a la militarizacion y a la ambicion de reagresion de Japon.

articles.title: Representante permanente coreano ante ONU envia carta al secretario general de ONU
articles.content:
Representante permanente coreano ante ONU envia carta al secretario general de ONU
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que en la Peninsula Coreana se crea una grave situacion a punto de estallar una guerra debido a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de mayor envergadura desarrollados por EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas, el representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU envio el dia 22 una carta al secretario general de la ONU. 
					La misiva revela concretamente la dimension, el objetivo y la peligrosidad de los simulacros conjuntos EE.UU.- el Sur de Corea y agrega que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no da ninguna respuesta a su apelacion hecha el pasado dia 6 para que se discuta este problema como agenda urgente. 
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU da espaladas a la apelacion de la RPDC y cuestiona los ejercicios ordinarios que desarrolla el Ejercito Popular de Corea en su propio territorio, lo cual es el climax de la parcialidad y de la pauta de doble rasero y el sucio prejuicio, critica la carta y continua:
					
					Las medidas regulares tomadas por la RPDC para fortalecer su capacidad de defensa nacional son para defender la soberania nacional desde la incesante amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					No solo la RPDC, sino tambien los paises vecinos expresan unanimemente la preocupacion por el caracter agresivo y la peligrosidad de los simulacros conjuntos EE.UU.-el Sur de Corea. 
					
					La imparcial sociedad internacional estima que los presentes ejercicios de guerra nuclear de mayor envergadura resultan la causa raigal que empuja a la RPDC a las acciones superintransigentes. 
					
					Exigimos a Vd. que segun el capitulo 99 de la Carta de la ONU, despierta la atencion al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sobre la peligrosidad de los simulacros conjuntos EE.UU.-el Sur de Corea que amenazan evidentemente la paz y seguridad internacionales. 
					
					Creemos que esto conviene totalmente a la demanda de la Carta de la ONU y a la mision del Secretariado de la ONU que toma por su vida la imparcialidad y la independencia. 
					
					Por ultimo, la carta expresa la esperanza de que el secretario general de la ONU, quien juro ser fiel a la Carta de la ONU, daria una respuesta positiva al llamamiento sincero de la RPDC.

articles.title: Investigador del Instituto del MINREX ironiza situacion de traidores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Investigador del Instituto del MINREX ironiza situacion de traidores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El investigador del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Song Il, publico el dia 23 un comentario intitulado "Trato merecido". 
					El texto completo va como sigue:
					
					Despues de la visita del secretario de Estado norteamericano Rex Tillerson a Japon, el Sur de Corea y China, los titeres surcoreanos se quejan de su situacion miserable, lo cual llama la atencion de los medios de prensa de muchos paises. 
					
					El rotativo surcoreano Choongang Ilbo publico un articulo precisando que durante su gira, Tillerson alabo a Japon como "aliado mas importante" y se limito a calificar al Sur de Corea de "acompanante importante".
					
					Segun el texto, la administracion Trump discrimina al Sur de Corea considerando la alianza con este como la inferior a la otra con Japon. En Japon, Tillerson expreso su posicion en una conferencia de prensa tras intercambiar en lo suficiente las opiniones con el canciller japones. Pero, en el Sur de Corea, concedio primero la rueda de prensa antes del dialogo con el canciller surcoreano desestimando el criterio de los titeres surcoreanos. Y celebro la cena con las autoridades diplomaticas en China y Japon, pero no lo hizo en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Maeil Kyongje transmitio que en el encuentro con su homologo chino, el visitante norteamericano no dijo nada del sistema antimisiles THAAD y asi se ha quebrado la esperanza de que EE.UU. ejerza influencias sobre China que presiona al Sur de Corea en el problema de emplazamiento de esa arma. 
					
					Los medios de prensa de muchos paises del mundo tambien estiman que el Sur de Corea esta muy decepcionado de la reciente visita del secretario de Estado. 
					
					Merecen tal maltrato los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Es que ellos se portaron como marionetas bajo las batutas de EE.UU. y la adivinanza de la bruja mentora (Choe Sun Sil) sin mantener el criterio propio ni la "politica" fija.
					
					 Todo el mundo conoce que la traidora Park Geun-hye vino practicando la "politica de presionar al Norte" abrigando esperanza en el "rumor de derrumbe del Norte" y persiguiendo la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" e impulso por la fuerza el despliegue de THAAD, que generara inquietud y desastre en la Peninsula Coreana y la region, pese al unanime rechazo y condena de los nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					 Si bien los titeres surcoreanos recrudecen la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida implementando al frente la politica hostil norteamericana a la RPDC, EE.UU. los trata como a sus sirvientes nada mas.
					
					  El reciente acto verbal del secretario de Estado hizo conocer bien a todo el mundo cuales son las relaciones entre el patron y su criado y como EE.UU. trata al Sur de Corea.
					
					  El pragmatismo al estilo norteamericano consiste en utilizar a cualquier persona cuando le haga falta y abandonarla cuando le signifique una molestia.
					
					  Se quedaran siempre sirvientes los que recurran a la campana fratricida sumandose a la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC sin distinguir quien es el enemigo principal de la reunificacion y de nuestra nacion.
					
					  Sufrira verguenza e ignominia si se trata con los traidores surcoreanos abandonados hasta por su patron gringo.

articles.title: ACNC califica de camaleones a politicastros surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC califica de camaleones a politicastros surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Despues de la dimision de la traidora Park Geun-hye, se portan como camaleones los compinches de los partidos conservadores surcoreanos. 
					El presidente del comite de medidas emergentes, In Myong Jin, y otros militantes del "Partido de Corea Libre" tratan de seducir al pueblo con palabras hipocritas como "aceptar con sinceridad la sentencia de dimision" y "sentir en carne propia la responsabilidad". 
					
					Partiendo del objetivo politico, registran como candidato "presidencial" al gobernador de la provincia de Kyongsang del Sur, Hong Jun Phyo, quien fue expulsado practicamente del "Partido de Corea Libre", anulandole el castigo de suspension del derecho de militante. 
					
					Entre tanto, Ryu Sung Min y otros integrantes del "Partido Parun" enganan a la opinion publica hablando como si ellos hubieran cumplido el "papel protagonico" en lograr la dimision de Park Geun-hye.
					
					El proceder de tales camaleones politicos de version moderna parte de la artimana de ocultar a toda costa sus crimenes cometidos junto con la traidora Park recurriendo al servilismo a grandes potencias y usurpar el poder en las "elecciones presidenciales" anticipadas. 
					
					Pero, con tal fraude no pueden ocultar la naturaleza de traidores a la nacion. 
					
					Los compinches del "Partido de Corea Libre" y del "Partido Parun" son los criminales principales que durante 4 anos de mandato de Park, dio al traste con la "administracion estatal" y llevo a la miseria la vida de la poblacion sumandose a las politicas antipopulares de la mandataria destituida. 
					
					In Myong Jin es el connotado conservador que hasta el 19 de enero pasado, decia asi: "defendere hasta el final a la presidenta Park aunque me recaiga la responsabilidad politica o el reproche y no permitire nunca el castigo a ella". 
					
					El candidato a la "presidencia" Hong Jun Phyo es la figura clave de la corrupcion quien estuvo involucrado en el escandalo de desfalco de fondos politicos ilegales y fue condenado el ano pasado por la fiscalia a dos anos de prision y a 100 millones de wones de multa.
					
					Cuando se dicto la sentencia de dimision de Park, el desafio a la voluntad del pueblo levantado con velas expresando su descontento con palabras como "juicio basado en el prejuicio de la opinion publica". 
					
					Ryu Sung Min, candidato a la "presidencia" del "Partido Parun", es reconocido en el circulo politico surcoreano como "politico traidor" por su habilidad de cambiar facilmente su criterio. 
					
					Cuando era representante parlamentario del "Partido Saenuri", dijo que "siento mucho por no haber apoyado bien a la mandataria Park que manejo con abnegacion los quehaceres estatales". Pero, salio de su partido al ver que no le convenia quedarse. 
					
					Como se ve, esos partidarios de Park Geun-hye estan desesperados para reagrupar las fuerzas conservadoras. 
					
					El sucio camuflaje y la pugna de los partidos conservadores resultan intolerable insulto y burla a la poblacion levantada en la lucha con velas con el deseo de construir nueva sociedad.
					
					Ahora crece cada dia mas el numero de los habitantes surcoreanos que se quedan desenganados de los compinches conservadores. 
					
					El "Partido de Corea Libre" y el "Partido Parun" deben disolverse sin demora segun la demanda de la poblacion y desaparecer del circulo politico del Sur de Corea junto con la diabla de Chongwadae.
